unnormalised: Hey Students, Scholarship Season is ON! Ditch the endless Google searches and head straight to scholarship portals! These EdTech wonders are like having your own personal scholarship guru, guiding you through the maze of applications.
normalised: Hey Students, Scholarship Season is ON! Ditch the endless Google searches and head straight to scholarship portals! These EdTech wonders are like having your own personal scholarship guru, guiding you through the maze of applications.

unnormalised: Think of portals like "Vidya Dhan" or "ScholarshipPeIndia" – they're chock-full of opportunities for students from all backgrounds. Whether you're eyeing a B.Tech at IIT Madras or a degree in Fine Arts, chances are there's a scholarship out there for you.
normalised: Think of portals like "Vidya Dhan" or "ScholarshipPeIndia" – they're chock full of opportunities for students from all backgrounds. Whether you're eyeing a B. Tech at I I T Madras or a degree in Fine Arts, chances are there's a scholarship out there for you.

unnormalised: Many portals now offer personalized recommendations based on your grades and interests. It's like getting a curated menu of scholarships – no more sifting through scholarships you're not even eligible for! Imagine feasting on a delicious plate of biryani instead of sorting through stale roti, that's the difference!
normalised: Many portals now offer personalized recommendations based on your grades and interests. It's like getting a curated menu of scholarships – no more sifting through scholarships you're not even eligible for! Imagine feasting on a delicious plate of biryani instead of sorting through stale roti, that's the difference!

unnormalised: Plus, with Onam around the corner, what better gift to give yourself (and your parents!) than a fully-funded education? So, fire up those laptops and get applying! Deadline for many scholarships closing soon, so don't delay! Good luck!
